sense.gloss: failing to live up to (one's name, looks, etc.)
x: 名前負け・なまえまけ

sense.gloss: to succumb, to give in, to surrender, to yield
to break out in a rash due to (e.g. lacquer, shaving, etc.)
x: 気触れる・かぶれる・1

sense.gloss: to reduce the price, to give a discount, to throw in (something extra) for free
to carry on one's back, to bear, to shoulder
to take (responsibility), to assume, to accept, to bear (the blame, costs, etc.), to have (a duty, obligation, etc.), to become responsible for, to be burdened with (work, debt, etc.)
to suffer (an injury), to sustain (a wound), to receive, to incur (a loss, damage, etc.)
to owe (a debt of gratitude to), to be indebted to
to have (something) behind one, to be backed by
wooden box carried on one's back to store items for a pilgrimage

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑負↑↓ま↓けだ、↑降参↑↓こうさん↓しろ。
sdata.e: You have been beaten. Give in!

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑歌↑↓うた↓はプロ↑顔負↑↓かおま↓けだ。
sdata.e: Your singing puts professional singers to shame.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑負↑↓ま↓けるとは↑夢↑↓ゆめ↓にも↑思↑↓おも↓わなかった。
sdata.e: Never did I dream that you would lose.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑間抜↑↓まぬ↓けだったおかげで、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓たちはその↑試合↑↓しあい↓に↑負↑↓ま↓けたんだ。
sdata.e: Thanks to your stupidity, we lost the game.

sdata.j: ↑驚↑↓おどろ↓いたことに↑彼↑↓かれ↓はその↑試合↑↓しあい↓で↑負↑↓ま↓けてしまった。
sdata.e: To our surprise, he was defeated in the match.

sdata.j: ↑驚↑↓おどろ↓いたことに↑彼↑↓かれ↓はそのその↑試合↑↓しあい↓で↑負↑↓ま↓けてしまった。
sdata.e: To our surprise, he was defeated in the match.

sdata.j: ↑競馬↑↓けいば↓で↑負↑↓ま↓けて、スッテンテンだよ。
sdata.e: I just lost at the races so I'm flat broke.

sdata.j: ↑泣↑↓な↓いている↑赤↑↓あか↓ん↑坊↑↓ぼう↓は↑手↑↓て↓に↑負↑↓お↓えない。
sdata.e: It's hard to handle crying babies.

sdata.j: ↑議論↑↓ぎろん↓をすることとなると、↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑誰↑↓だれ↓にも↑負↑↓ま↓けない。
sdata.e: He is second to none when it comes to debating.
